endpoints.name: List Scheduled Events for Guild
endpoints.description: Returns a list of [guild scheduled event](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD_SCHEDULED_EVENT/guild-scheduled-event-object) objects for the given guild.

endpoints.name: Create Guild Scheduled Event
endpoints.description: Create a guild scheduled event in the guild. Returns a [guild scheduled event](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD_SCHEDULED_EVENT/guild-scheduled-event-object) object on success.

endpoints.name: Get Guild Scheduled Event
endpoints.description: Get a guild scheduled event. Returns a [guild scheduled event](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD_SCHEDULED_EVENT/guild-scheduled-event-object) object on success.

endpoints.name: Modify Guild Scheduled Event
endpoints.description: Modify a guild scheduled event. Returns the modified [guild scheduled event](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD_SCHEDULED_EVENT/guild-scheduled-event-object) object on success.

endpoints.name: Delete Guild Scheduled Event
endpoints.description: Delete a guild scheduled event. Returns a `204` on success.

endpoints.name: Get Guild Scheduled Event Users
endpoints.description: Get a list of guild scheduled event users subscribed to a guild scheduled event. Returns a list of [guild scheduled event user](#DOCS_RESOURCES_GUILD_SCHEDULED_EVENT/guild-scheduled-event-user-object) objects on success. Guild member data, if it exists, is included if the `with_member` query parameter is set.
